snippet.title: PUBG MOBILE 0.5.0: Miramar Trailer
snippet.description:
PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS goes mobile - the original Battle Royale game is now available on your device! Download now for iOS and Android: https://goo.gl/Nyjvba 

Follow us on: 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/PUBGMOBILE 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PUBGMOBILE
